summary.span: 定义一种文本内容类型，其中的度量、命中测试以及整个内容的绘制都将作为整体执行。

span.span: Defines a type of text content in which measuring, hit testing and drawing of the entire content is done in whole.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本行中间的按钮就是的一个示例。An example of a is a button in the middle of a line of text.

related.span: 高级文本格式设置示例

span.span: Advanced Text Formatting Sample
